com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model

Class FieldDescriptor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.model.FieldDescriptor<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexFieldDescriptor, MultiValueFieldDescriptor, SingleValueFieldDescriptor

    public abstract class FieldDescriptor<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    General type-independent field descriptor. It is implemented by type specific field descriptors.
    Since:
    15.06.16.
